## 0.1 Directories

Home Directory:  
Directory to save important documents. The Directory you are in when login with putty. 
To access home directory, using command:
```{bash}
cd /home/[your user name]
```

Data Directory: Directory to save large data files. To access data folder, using command:
```{bash}
cd /nfs/[your user name]
```
